p: There was no significant difference in general laboratory values (TP, T-Cho and red blood cell count) between day 1 and either the 29th or 57th day, but at both timepoints, Hyp and X were significantly increased, while UA was significantly decreased ( P < .0001 for each comparison) (Table 4). Systolic blood pressure, diastolic blood pressure, pulse rate, and body temperature did not change between before the treatment and either the 29th or 57th day of the treatment period (data not shown).
